filmography.title: Winchester '73
filmography.role_description: A Native American leader who plays a pivotal role in the final shootout; an early supporting role for Hudson.
filmography.plot: A cowboy's obsession with a prize-winning rifle leads him on a chase through the Wild West.

filmography.title: Bend of the River
filmography.role_description: A professional gambler who joins a wagon train to Oregon and finds himself caught between the settlers and corrupt miners.
filmography.plot: A town-tamer with a past guides a wagon train to Oregon and battles hijackers to ensure the settlers get their food supplies.

filmography.title: Has Anybody Seen My Gal?
filmography.role_description: A soda jerk who falls in love with the daughter of a family being tested by a wealthy man's secret gift.
filmography.plot: A rich man intends to leave his fortune to the family of a woman who rejected him, but decides to test them first.

filmography.title: Magnificent Obsession
filmography.role_description: A reckless playboy who inadvertently causes a woman's blindness and dedicates his life to becoming a surgeon to cure her.
filmography.plot: A reckless playboy is responsible for the death of a doctor and the blindness of his widow, leading him to seek redemption.

filmography.title: All That Heaven Allows
filmography.role_description: A younger, nature-loving gardener who falls in love with an older, wealthy widow, challenging the social norms of their town.
filmography.plot: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

filmography.title: Giant
filmography.role_description: A wealthy Texas cattle rancher who struggles to adapt to changing times and his rivalry with an oil tycoon.
filmography.plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and their rivalry with cowboy and oil tycoon Jett Rink.

filmography.title: Written on the Wind
filmography.role_description: The responsible, level-headed best friend to an alcoholic oil heir, caught in a web of jealousy and family dysfunction.
filmography.plot: The alcoholic son of a Texas oil tycoon marries a secretary, but his jealousy and his sister's interference threaten to destroy them.

filmography.title: Battle Hymn
filmography.role_description: A real-life pilot who accidentally bombed a German orphanage in WWII and seeks redemption by saving Korean war orphans.
filmography.plot: A guilt-ridden pilot becomes a minister and returns to the Air Force to train pilots in Korea, where he also helps orphans.

filmography.title: A Farewell to Arms
filmography.role_description: An American ambulance driver serving in the Italian army during WWI who falls in love with a British nurse.
filmography.plot: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

filmography.title: The Tarnished Angels
filmography.role_description: A hard-drinking reporter who becomes fascinated by a barnstorming pilot and his wife during the Depression.
filmography.plot: A reporter becomes involved with a WWI flying ace, his parachutist wife, and their mechanic during an air show in New Orleans.

filmography.title: Pillow Talk
filmography.role_description: A songwriter who shares a party line with an interior decorator, feigning a cowboy persona to woo her.
filmography.plot: A man and woman who share a telephone line despise each other, but then he has fun by romancing her under a false identity.

filmography.title: This Earth Is Mine
filmography.role_description: The illegitimate grandson of a vineyard patriarch who wants to sell grapes to bootleggers during Prohibition.
filmography.plot: A family saga set in the California wine country during the Prohibition era.

filmography.title: The Last Sunset
filmography.role_description: A sheriff who chases an outlaw into Mexico, only to join him on a cattle drive while pursuing the outlaw's wife.
filmography.plot: A sheriff chases an outlaw into Mexico, but ends up helping him drive cattle to Texas.

filmography.title: Come September
filmography.role_description: A wealthy businessman who discovers his Italian villa has been turned into a hotel by his major domo.
filmography.plot: An American millionaire arrives early for his annual vacation in Italy to find his villa being used as a hotel.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – World Film Favorite

filmography.title: Lover Come Back
filmography.role_description: An ad executive who uses unethical methods to win clients, clashing with his female rival until he invents a fake product.
filmography.plot: An advertising executive uses a non-existent product to secure a client, but his rival tries to expose him.

filmography.title: The Spiral Road
filmography.role_description: An arrogant, atheistic doctor who travels to the jungles of Java and undergoes a spiritual transformation.
filmography.plot: A doctor travels to the Dutch East Indies to study leprosy and undergoes a crisis of faith.

filmography.title: A Gathering of Eagles
filmography.role_description: A Strategic Air Command officer who must improve the efficiency of his wing, even if it means alienating his friends.
filmography.plot: An Air Force colonel is assigned to shape up a Strategic Air Command wing that has failed a surprise inspection.

filmography.title: Man's Favorite Sport?
filmography.role_description: A famous fishing expert and author who has actually never fished in his life, forced to enter a tournament.
filmography.plot: A fishing tackle salesman who has never fished is entered into a fishing tournament by his boss.

filmography.title: Send Me No Flowers
filmography.role_description: A hypochondriac who mistakenly believes he is dying and tries to find a new husband for his wife.
filmography.plot: A hypochondriac believes he is dying and tries to find a new husband for his wife, leading to misunderstandings.

filmography.title: Strange Bedfellows
filmography.role_description: An American oil executive who enters a marriage of convenience with a bohemian artist to improve his corporate image.
filmography.plot: An executive and an artist marry impulsively, separate, and then must pretend to be happily married for a promotion.

filmography.title: Seconds
filmography.role_description: A middle-aged banker who undergoes a radical procedure to fake his death and become a younger, bohemian artist.
filmography.plot: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity.

filmography.title: Tobruk
filmography.role_description: A Canadian officer who joins a group of British commandos and German Jews on a mission to destroy Rommel's fuel reserves.
filmography.plot: Allied commandos and German-Jewish refugees try to destroy Rommel's fuel bunkers in Tobruk.

filmography.title: Ice Station Zebra
filmography.role_description: A US nuclear submarine commander sent to the Arctic to retrieve a spy satellite capsule before the Soviets get it.
filmography.plot: A US submarine commander races the Soviets to the North Pole to retrieve a downed spy satellite.

filmography.title: The Undefeated
filmography.role_description: A Confederate colonel who leads his men to Mexico after the Civil War and forms an uneasy alliance with a Union colonel.
filmography.plot: After the Civil War, a Union Colonel drives cattle to Mexico and crosses paths with a Confederate Colonel leading his men to a new life.

filmography.title: Darling Lili
filmography.role_description: An American pilot in WWI who falls for a popular German singer who is secretly a spy.
filmography.plot: A German spy posing as a singer is assigned to seduce an American pilot to get military secrets.

filmography.title: The Mirror Crack'd
filmography.role_description: A film director and devoted husband to a movie star, who becomes involved in a murder investigation in a quiet English village.
filmography.plot: Miss Marple investigates when a local woman dies after drinking a poisoned cocktail intended for a visiting movie star.
